verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> all their <S%H4264>armies<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek:<s%> and the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> by the <S%H5869>spring<s%> which is in <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

The <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> by <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and by <S%H505>thousands;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> in the <S%H314>rear<s%> with <S%H397>Achish.<s%>

Then the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What about these <S%H5680>Hebrews?<s%>" <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H1732>"Isn't<s%> this David, the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who has been with me these <S%H3117>days,<s%> or rather these <S%H8141>years,<s%> and I have <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H3972>fault<s%> in him <S%H3117>since<s%> he <S%H5307>fell<s%> away to this <S%H3117>day?<s%>"

But the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H7107>angry<s%> with <S%H8269>him;<s%> and the princes of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7725>him,<s%> "Make the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7725>return,<s%> that he may go <S%H7725>back<s%> to his <S%H4725>place<s%> where you have <S%H6485>appointed<s%> <S%H3381>him,<s%> and let him not go down with us to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> lest in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> he become an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> to <S%H7521>us.<s%> For with what should this fellow reconcile himself to his <S%H113>lord?<s%> Should it not be with the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of these <S%H582>men?<s%>

Is not this <S%H1732>David,<s%> of whom they <S%H6030>sang<s%> one to another in <S%H4246>dances,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7586><s%> 'Saul has <S%H5221>slain<s%> his <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his ten <S%H7233>thousands?<s%>'"

Then <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>him,<s%> "As Yahweh <S%H2416>lives,<s%> you have been <S%H3477>upright,<s%> and your going <S%H3318>out<s%> and your coming <S%H935>in<s%> with me in the <S%H4264>army<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight;<s%> for I have not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in you since the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H935>coming<s%> to me to this <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H5633>Nevertheless,<s%> the lords <S%H5869>don't<s%> favor <S%H2896>you.<s%>
Therefore now <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> that you not <S%H7451>displease<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H397>Achish,<s%> "But what have I <S%H6213>done?<s%> What have you <S%H4672>found<s%> in your <S%H5650>servant<s%> so long <S%H3117>as<s%> I have been before <S%H6440>you<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I may not <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king?<s%>"

<S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> "I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are <S%H2896>good<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> as an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> Notwithstanding the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5927><s%> 'He shall not go up with us to the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>'

Therefore now rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> with the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of your <S%H113>lord<s%> who have <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H7925>you;<s%> and as soon as you are up early in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and have <S%H215>light,<s%> <S%H3212>depart.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early,<s%> he and his <S%H582>men,<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>
